page.title: 20COMMENTS ON THE SOFTWARE
page.content: I DID NOT AT FIRST REALISE THAT THE TEXT IS FIRST SAVED AND THEN THE TITLE AND KEYWORDS ARE SAVED BY PRESSING THE ESCAPE KEY.THIS SHOULD HAVE BEEN MUCH MORE STRONGLY EMPHASISED IN THE DOCUMENTATION. I TRIED TO INVOLVE THE PUPILS BY MAKING 5 BACKUP COPIES FOR THEM TO WORK ON,EACH WITH 4 PAGES OF TEXT TO TYPE IN.HOWEVER I DID NOT REALISE THAT THE TEXT CANNOT BE COPIED FORM ONE DISC TO ANOTHER IN THIS FASHION SINCE IT DOES NOT COPY JUST A SINGLE PAGE OF TEXT AT ONE TIME. ENTERING OF THE COUNT DATA WAS SIMPLE AND QUITE WELL EXPLAINED. ON THE WHOLE THOUGH I FEEL THAT THE SOFTWARE COULD HAVE BEEN MORE USER-FRIENDLY AND ROBUST CONSIDERING THAT JUNIOR-SCHOOL TEACHERS WERE TO USE IT.
